personal_information.name: Piyush Gambhir
personal_information.description: A dedicated and efficient software engineer with a strong background in full-stack web development and artificial intelligence.

education.detailed_description: Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science with a strong focus on software engineering and artificial intelligence. Achieved a CGPA of 8.87 till the fifth semester.
Completed high school education with a focus on science and mathematics, achieving a percentage score of 87.0% in the CBSE Class XII board examinations.
Completed secondary education, achieving a percentage score of 88.3% in the CBSE Class X board examinations.

responsibilities: Built robust dealer websites using Next.js and Express (Sails), incorporating features such as inventory management, search functionality, and lead capture forms.
Developed full-stack web applications using the Next.js framework for the frontend and the Express (Sails) framework for the backend, along with SQL for data storage.
Designed and implemented tools for internal usage by non-technical teams, resulting in a 20% improvement in user productivity.
Worked on web scraping tasks to collect and process data, which was used to improve the companyâ€™s AI models.

projects.name: ChatGPT Clone
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end ChatGPT clone using cutting-edge technologies, including Next.js for frontend, Tailwind CSS for styling, OpenAI API for natural language processing, and Prisma for database interactions.

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end Netflix clone using Next.js for frontend, Tailwind CSS for styling, and Prisma for database interactions. Implemented secure user authentication using NextAuth.js.
